ProductInfo.Features:
Lightning Fast Intel Core i7-3630QM Processor offers extra power to handle intensive software. Runs most programs and applications - Great for multi-tasking, too!
8GB DDR3 Memory; delivers faster, smoother multitasking.
DVD±RW Dual Layer optical drive; reads and writes data on DVDs and CD's.
Extra large 1TB hard drive stores thousands of movies, songs and files.
802.11b/g/n WiFi for work or play on the go (Intel 2230 Wireless PCIe Mini Card).
Bluetooth 4.0 Easily link with other Bluetooth-enabled devices, such as a mobile phone or MP3 player.
NVIDIA GeForce GT 650M GDDR5 2GB supports the latest DirectX 11 games and HD video editing
Red Back-lit keyboard with stylish design. Ever try to use your computer in a low light environment? This back lit keyboard will allow you to see your keys crystal clear no matter how dark it is.
15.6" HD LED Wide Screen with 1366 x 768 resolution
Chat in style with the Integrated 720p HD webcam
10/10/1000 Gigabit Ethernet LAN
The Back-Lit ACCUTYPE KEYBOARD gives you a cleaner, cooler-looking ID with a nice red light effect. It's Easy to clean and maintain Finger-friendly key shape Safer, comfortable use Less mistyping Ergonomic spacebar Comfortable keypress
Provides a stable platform for word processing, Web navigation, gaming, media storage and more.
You can rediscover your computer with access to a world of entertaining and useful apps like Lenovo Companion and Lenovo Support.
Using your computer should be fun and easy, not intimidating. That's why Lenovo created the OneKey Rescue System. In the event of system corruption, you can restore your operating system and recover valuable data with the touch of a button and a simple interface
User-friendly features. The sleek, contemporary Lenovo Y500 laptops are designed with comfort and convenience in mind, making this device as easy to use as it is functional
Tackle your everyday digital tasks with powerful Intel processors, enjoy stutter-free multitasking with highly responsive DDR3 memory, and take advantage of ample storage space for your photos, videos, music, and other files. Enjoy affordable home-computing, perfect for your family's daily needs and optimized for multimedia
Comes with Youcam which has all the fun features and effects you can use when chatting with friends, and powerful utilities to enhance your work presentations, tutorials or video conferencing.
LENOVO CLOUD STORAGE BY SUGARSYNC: Share files across all of your devices. Automatic syncing feature automatically downloads all files from the cloud onto every PC. Supports most mobile devices
HDMI out and 6-in-1 card reader for connection to an HDTV and input for your camera memory cards. Make your entertainment and media transfers as easy as they are convenient
The Lenovo IdeaPad Y500 comes preloaded with a package of multimedia and productivity applications that provide a great interactive user experience. You also get many security and support applications that are responsive to your needs, with online help and up-to-date advice.
Lenovo Cloud Storage - share files across all of your devices
Transfer data 10 times faster. USB 3.0 ports transfer data 10 times faster than USB 2.0 connectors and use less energy to do so.
Long battery life. Lenovo's Energy Management technology maximizes efficiency and lets you get the most out of your battery.
Dolby Home Theatre v4 audio enhancement & JBL designed speakers
AccuWeather - customized weather reports for the cities you choose
Amazon Kindle - buy, download and read books eBay - browse, bid and sell with ease Skype - video and text chat with friends Evernote - take photos, draw and make notes on any PC or mobile device Nitro PDF - create and edit PDF files
Lenovo Energy Management - easily control your notebook's energy usage
Genuine Windows 8. Beautiful, fast, and fluid Windows 8 has been reimagined to be all about you. Put what matters most right on your Start screen, and get instant access to your people, apps, and stuff, so you can spend less time searching and more time Doing.
** This unit comes with a English Canadian QWERTY keyboard, which means all the keys are in the same spot as on a regular US keyboard, but some keys have extra characters on it that can be activated with the function key **
ProductInfo.Name: Lenovo IdeaPad Y500 Performance Gaming Laptop - Intel Core i7-3630QM, 1TB HDD, 8GB DDR3, NVIDIA GeForce GT650M 2GB GDDR5, Bluetooth, 15.6" HD WideScreen, DVD±RW, USB3.0, Backlit Keyboard, Windows 8 64-bit
